title: website: tip.golang.org "playground not defined"
body:
by **jeremy@chaordix.com**: 
I can't use the "Try Go" box on tip.golang.org. When I view Chrome's
javascript console, I see:

Uncaught ReferenceError: playground is not defined 

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. go to tip.golang.org
2. try to select an example program, click Run, etc.
3. Nothing happens.
